data.event: One of the New Hampshire grants, the township was chartered on August 20, 1761 by Governor Benning Wentworth and awarded to Gideon Lyman and 61 others.

event.title: 1888, the Jones and Lamson Machine Tool Company (J&L) moved

data.event: In 1888, the Jones and Lamson Machine Tool Company (J&L) moved to Springfield from Windsor, Vermont under the successful leadership of James Hartness.

event.title: co-founded the Fellows Gear Shaper Company here in 1896

data.event: Edwin R. Fellows co-founded the Fellows Gear Shaper Company here in 1896.
